member.name: T:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl
member.summary: ZoomControl lets users zoom and pan a target web control, which implements the IZoomTarget interface.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ZoomControl class.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.OnInit(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: WebControl.OnInit override.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: WebControl.OnPreRender override.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.RenderBeginTag(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)
member.summary: WebControl.RenderBeginTag override.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.RenderContents(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)
member.summary: WebControl.RenderContents override.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.LoadPostData(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData implementation.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.RaisePostDataChangedEvent
member.summary: IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent implementation.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.Target
member.summary: Gets or sets the target control associated with this ZoomControl.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.TargetId
member.summary: Gets or sets the id of the target control associated with this ZoomControl.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.MinZoomFactor
member.summary: The minimum zoom level allowed to set through this control.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.MaxZoomFactor
member.summary: The maximum zoom level allowed to set through this control.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.ZoomFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets the current zoom level.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.ZoomStep
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount by which to change zoom level when + and - buttons are clicked.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.ScrollStep
member.summary: Gets or sets the scroll offset added when users click the pan arrows.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.AutoPostBack
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a postback to the server automatically occurs when the value of the control changes.
member.remarks: This property is used only if ClientSideMode is set to ClientSideMode.ImageMap.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.SnapToZoomStep
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the trackbar should snap to ZoomStep values when dragged.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.ShowLabel
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the label that shows the current zoom level should be visible.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.TickPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the current tick position of the trackbar.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.Padding
member.summary: Gets or sets the padding of the control's contents.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.Fill
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush used to fill the ZoomControl elements.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.BackColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color of the control.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.ActiveColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color used to render depressed buttons.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.BorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of ZoomControl elements' borders.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.InnerColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of plus, minus and arrow icons.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.ShadowColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the shadow color.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.TextColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush of the the label that shows the current zoom level.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.CornerRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the corner radius of rounded child elements.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.ClientSideMode
member.summary: Specifies the method used for handling user interaction and drawing on the client side.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.ClientScriptMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating which library will be used in the control's client-side scripts.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.JQueryLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL to the JQuery script file.
member.remarks: This property is used only if ClientScriptMode is set to ClientScriptMode.JQuery.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.MsAjaxLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL to the Microsoft Ajax script file.
member.remarks: This property is used only if ClientScriptMode is set to ClientScriptMode.MsAjax.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ZoomControl.ImageGenLocation
member.summary: URL to the ImageGen.ashx file, used to generate the barcode images. This property is rendered as a SRC attribute for the label's IMG element.

member.name: T:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.IZoomTarget
member.summary: Specifies the capabilities required by ZoomControl from its target controls.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.IZoomTarget.SetZoomLevel(System.Double)
member.summary: Sets a new zoom level.
member.param: A float value specifying the zoom level.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.IZoomTarget.GetZoomLevel
member.summary: Gets the current zoom level.
member.returns: A float value specifying the zoom level.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.IZoomTarget.SetZoomStep(System.Double)
member.summary: Sets a new zoom step.
member.param: A float value specifying the zoom step.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.IZoomTarget.GetZoomStep
member.summary: Gets the current zoom step.
member.returns: A float value specifying the zoom step.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.IZoomTarget.SetScrollX(System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the horizontal scroll position.
member.param: A float value specifying the horizontal scroll position.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.IZoomTarget.GetScrollX
member.summary: Sets the horizontal scroll position.
member.returns: A float value specifying the horizontal scroll position.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.IZoomTarget.SetScrollY(System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the vertical scroll position.
member.param: A float value specifying the vertical scroll position.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.IZoomTarget.GetScrollY
member.summary: Gets the vertical scroll position.
member.returns: A float value specifying the vertical scroll position.

member.name: E:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.IZoomTarget.ZoomLevelChanged
member.summary: Raised to notify that the target's zoom level has changed.

member.name: T:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ControlHelper
member.summary: Provides helper methods for working with the ASP.NET page controls hierarchy.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ControlHelper.FindControlRecursive(System.Web.UI.Control,System.String)
member.summary: Recursively looks for a child control with the specified ID.
member.param: The parent control from which to start the search.
Specifies the ID of the child control to find.
member.returns: A reference to the control, or null if no control with the specified ID has been found.

member.name: T:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ClientManager
member.summary: Adds references to common scripts.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ClientManager.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ClientManager class.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ClientManager.AddScriptsToPage(System.Web.UI.Page)
member.summary: Adds references to common scripts to the provided page.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ClientManager.AddScriptReferences
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should render references to the client scripts.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ClientManager.ClientScriptMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating which library will be used in the control's client-side scripts.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ClientManager.JQueryLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL to the JQuery script file.
member.remarks: This property is used only if ClientSideMode is set to ClientSideMode.JQuery.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ClientManager.MsAjaxLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL to the Microsoft Ajax script file.
member.remarks: This property is used only if ClientSideMode is set to ClientSideMode.MsAjax.

member.name: T:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ClientScriptMode
member.summary: Specifies the implementation used in the control's client-side scripts.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ClientScriptMode.MsAjax
member.summary: Indicates that MicrosoftAjax script will be used.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ClientScriptMode.JQuery
member.summary: Indicates that JQuery script will be used.

member.name: T:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.TickPosition
member.summary: Specifies the position of trackbar ticks.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.TickPosition.None
member.summary: There are no ticks rendered.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.TickPosition.Left
member.summary: Ticks are rendered on the left side of the trackbar.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.TickPosition.Right
member.summary: Ticks are rendered on the right side of the trackbar.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.TickPosition.Both
member.summary: Ticks are rendered on both sides of the trackbar.

member.name: T:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ClientSideMode
member.summary: Specifies the method used for handling user interaction and drawing on the client side.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ClientSideMode.Canvas
member.summary: The control is rendered on the client side using an HTML5 Canvas.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Common.WebForms.ClientSideMode.ImageMap
member.summary: The control is rendered on the client side using an image and an HTML image map.
